mapper.select: SELECT num,cateNum,name,image,price,cast,hours,location,TO_CHAR(startdate,'YY.MM.DD') AS startdate, TO_CHAR(enddate,'YY.MM.DD') AS enddate,remainCount,tel,seatNum FROM shop ORDER BY num ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num,writer,cateNum,name,price,image,cast,hours,location,TO_CHAR(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as startdate,TO_CHAR(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as enddate,remainCount,tel,seatNum, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM shop ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into shop (num,writer,cateNum,name,price,image,cast,hours,location, startdate, enddate,remainCount,tel,seatNum) values(shop_seq.nextval, #{writer},#{cateNum} ,#{name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{cast}, #{hours}, #{location},#{startdate},#{enddate},#{remainCount},#{tel},#{seatNum})
